greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (1! + 2! + ... + (n-1)!) mod n.
link: A.H.M. Smeets, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000 (first 1000 terms from T. D. Noe)
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(s=0, p=1); for (i=1, n-1, f = Mod(i, n); p*=f; s += p); lift(s); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 19 2019
results.author: _Alex Fink_, Feb 24 2002
